name: Rudolpho's Quest
description:
Rudolpho's Quest is a quirky short game where you play as a young reindeer scavenging the unique world for presents. 

"This is your final test, Rudolpho so explore the world and collect those presents!" Santa warmly says.

Collect all 25 presents (or more) in order to pass Santa's final test! Only then, can he become a part of Santa's crew. Throughout Rudolpho's quest, you will need to avoid bothering the civilians lest he lose his progress by angering them!

( Note: Press I to pull up the directions )

This was a solo game development endeavor in which I focused on programming and game design. 

2D Art: me

Programmer: me

Game Design: me

3D Art: Unity Store
